get.description: Get a list of all pickwaves Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWaves.AllPickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Pickwave state (optional), if not supplied then all states.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location id for waves

parameters.name: detailLevel
parameters.description: Detail level, if not supplied then all is assumed

get.description: Get a list of list of pickwaves for the current user Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Pickwave state (optional), if not supplied then all states.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location id for waves

parameters.name: detailLevel
parameters.description: Detail level, if not supplied then all is assumed

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location id for waves

parameters.name: detailLevel

parameters.name: state

parameters.name: locationId

get.description: Get a specific pickwave by id Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: pickingWaveId
parameters.description: Pickwave id

post.description: Update on or more pickwave items Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute
Update a pickwave header Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Returns a list of pickwaves as well as dummy entries for users who have permissions to complete pickwaves, but don't currently have any assigned. These entries will have a PickwaveId of 0. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWaves.GeneratePickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Pickwave state (optional), if not supplied then all states.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location id for waves

parameters.name: detailLevel
parameters.description: Detail level, if not supplied then all is assumed

post.description: Delete one or more orders from a pickwave Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWaves.DeletePickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

get.description: Returns a list of places that the requested item can be found, other than the location already suggested. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: stockItemId
parameters.description: Stock item Id

parameters.name: stockLocationId
parameters.description: Linnworks stock location Id

parameters.name: currentBinRackSuggestion
parameters.description: The name of the location that is currently set to pick from

parameters.name: includeNonPickLocations
parameters.description: If true, the response will also contain binracks that cannot be selected to pick from

post.description: Updates the batch/binrack for allocated pickwave item. Only applicable to pickwave items with batch information Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

Updates the batch/binrack for allocated pickwave item. Only applicable to pickwave items with batch information Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.OpenOrders.PickingWavesNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

GetPickingWavesRequest.description: Request for getting all pickwaves irrespective of user.

State.description: Pickwave state (optional), if not supplied then all states.

DetailLevel.description: Detail level, if not supplied then all is assumed

PickwaveHeaders.description: List of pickingwave headers without order details

Bins.description: List of bins and batches of items in the bins.

OrderCount.description: Order Count - Number of orders in pickwave.

ItemCount.description: Item Count - Number of items in pickwave.

ItemsPicked.description: Items Picked - Number of items picked in pickwave.

OrdersPicked.description: Orders Picked - Number of orders picked in pickwave.

Barcode.description: Barcode number on the item header

CurrentFullPercentage.description: Maximum volumetric capacity of the location WxDxH = volumetric

InTransit.description: Quantity of items currently in transit

PickedQuantity.description: Indicate how many units are now allocated in open orders

InventoryTrackingType.description: 0 - None, 1 - Order by sell by date, 2 - Ordered by priority sequence

Composition.description: Relationship between pickwave items and composite parent rows.

OrderItemRowId.description: Composite parent order item row id

WaveItemUpdates.description: List of pickwave items to update

UserId.description: Allocated user id, null will keep the current assigned user, -1 will de-allocated the user from the pickwave.

Pickwaves.description: Collection of pickwaves and their orders to generate. All order singular or composite child row ids must be provided, if batches exist on the order item then batch id must be supplied);

GroupType.description: Pickwave group type (optional, if not set parent sort will be used)

Items.description: Items to be added to the pickwave.

BatchInventoryId.description: Batch inventory id, if the item is batched or location is warehouse managed and id is not supplied then the whole order item will be added to the pickwave.

Bins.description: List of bins and batches of items in the bins.

CheckAllocatableToPickwaveRequest.description: Request for allocatioable orders to pickwave.

ProcessedOrderIds.description: Order Ids that had pickwaves deleted from them

NoPickwaves.description: OrderIds where there was no pickwave found against them

CurrentBinRackSuggestion.description: The name of the location that is currently set to pick from

IncludeNonPickLocations.description: If true, the response will also contain binracks that cannot be selected to pick from

AlternateLocations.description: A list of other batches that are available in the given linnworks stock location

PickableBins.description: A list of stock that is available to pick from

NonPickableBins.description: A list of stock that cannot directly be picked from

PickingWaveItemRowIds.description: List of pickwave item row ids to replace with the new location

NewBatchInventoryId.description: The new batch inventory to pick

SortType.description: Dictates how the returned pickwave should be sorted
